desc: Rudy's Bar & Grill is a local dive bar with a rich history established in 1933.  Located in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, (near Times Square), Rudy's is a real gem to New York City locals and tourists alike, serving cheap beer and free hot dogs--the Ultimate NYC Dive Bar experience!

layout.text: Historic Dive Bar in NYC Since 1933
Cheap Beer and Free Hot Dogs with any purchase!
